summary: This header file defines OS-specific macros and configuration settings for Silicon Graphics IRIX operating systems in the sendmail project. It adapts configurations based on the IRIX version (4.x, 5.x, 6.x, or 64-bit) by detecting the MIPS ABI version through the _MIPS_SIM preprocessor value.

logs.reason: Identifies the operating system as IRIX in potential log messages that report platform information.
logs.resolution: No resolution required. This is an informational string used to identify the operating system in logs or error messages.
